subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The game’s momentum shifted, with the score at 1-1 in the third period, when the Rangers’ Ryan Callahan scored a short-handed goal with an assist from the former Devils’ star center, Scott Gomez.
snippet: The game’s momentum shifted, with the score at 1-1 in the third period, when the Rangers’ Ryan Callahan scored a short-handed goal with an assist from the former Devils’ star center, Scott Gomez.
